title: Deilie Jock
author: Campbell, C. M.
snippet: Ae nicht, when I had a pass, I was makin'for the side door of a wee pub just aff the VictoriaRoad. It was after closin' time, but the barmaid and me was gey freendly, and I kent thatthe master and his wife was awa' at some racemeetin', and no' to be back till the morn'snicht.
